examples.text: Adam öldürme dahil, kitapta yazan her şey için aranıyordu.
examples.translation: He was wanted for everything in the book, including murder.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish داخل (dahil, “who enters or is inside; inner, internal; inside, interior”), from Arabic دَاخِل (dāḵil), active participle of دَخَلَ (daḵala).
